comment: I have him for IT 3223 and CSE 4893, Very good prof and easy to get in contact with. All of the assignments are easy to understand. I would take him again. Earned an A in both classes I had him for

He knows his content well and the projects he has you do are not bad.   If you email him though he will respond in a timely manner but he is extremely rude!  He defaults to you are trying to lie or trick him and tries to call you out on it. If you are a student that needs little to no professor support I would consider taking him.

Humorous, knowledgeable professor. For his online classes, he has weekly lectures but attendance is not required. His assignments require a decent amount of reading. Discussions are due every two weeks and there is a group project.

One of the best teachers in the CCSE department at KSU. Genuinely cares and wants his students to succeed. He is always available to answer questions, and is quick to respond to emails - even if it's 4am (sorry again, professor)! Do the work, and you will have no problem passing this class. Great teacher, great class. Recommended for sure!
Good professor. Very real world knowledge based. Lectures are interesting. Likes to have you ready for the real world. Ask questions and create conversation. Very knowledge based professor

One of the greatest professors I have had here at KSU. He did an amazing job teaching the 4823 course because unlike all the professors here he actually has EXPERIENCE. The course itself is not too bad as it appears that it does at first but go to class and listen to him teach and you will want to go to class all the time trust me. Highly recommend
